column4: hey , how to connect to ssh server on ubuntu ? using external program ?
first i have to make sure you install ssh in both comptuers....sudo apt-get install openssh-server

once ur ssh'ed into your remote machine...if i u want to execute program ON THE remote machine..u type in "DISPLAY=:0 firefox" for example...if u want to run a program on your machine u have to log in again using "ssh -X username@ipaddress
once ur sshed with -X you can run a program via terminal "firefox" "transmission" and  the window will display as if your on that machine
